channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Siarhei Piashko

item.description: title: “My DRY implementation of GET REST endpoint” date: 2022-01-05 hideSummary: true Introduction For long time I was interested in finding the most simple, small, flexible and the same time efficient implementation of GET rest-points. So in this article I will try to share my findings and hope you discover something interesting for you. And to make it easier to explain and understand let’s design and implement simple application with a couple of entities.
